  const replacementChars = source.split("")

ruleChapterList:
<js>
let list = [];
let push = (text, href, vol) => list.push({
    "text": text,
    "href": href,
    "vol": vol
});
let v = java.getElements('#chapterList>li');
for (let i = 0; i < v.length; i++) {
    if (v[i].attr('class') != 'w33p') {
        push(v[i].text(), v[i].attr('href'), true)
    } else {
        t = v[i].select('a')
        push(t.text(), t.attr('href'), false)
    }
}
list;
</js>
